title: Is it really necessary to do minors for cs placements or learning those subjects on our own is enough? (ECE student here)

comments.body: This question has been answered on the FAQs: https://bit.ly/pesu-faq

Hey so it's not compulsory for you to do your minors. It will give you a competitive edge over your peers. Getting an interview will be the same process for everyone but in the interview it will max to max be a talking point and not something which will give your profile a boost. Minor courses are for your knowledge and you must learn those essential CS topics to ace your technical interviews. Don't expect to just breeze through the minors and have a 'specialised' treatment.
